text: Ndithudi chopereka chaulele chiperekedwe kwa anthu osauka, osowa ndi iwo amene amagwira ntchito yosonkhanitsa zoperekazo, ndi iwo amene angolowa chipembedzo cha Chisilamu, kuombola akapolo, anthu amene apanikizidwa ndi ngongole, amene agwira ntchito ya Mulungu ndi munthu wa paulendo; limeneli ndi lamulo la Mulungu. Mulungu ndi wodziwa chilichonse ndi Wanzeru
